data.name: Tool_AttributeMissing

data.value: Current project type is unsupported for this tool.

data.value: Output of type CodeDom must be either a CodeNamespace or a CodeCompileUnit.

data.name: Tool_NoCodeDomSupport
data.value: Current project type can't have code elements, or can't compile to a .NET language. Supported project types are C# and VB.NET.

data.name: XmlValidate_Failed
